show.subtitle: Stories and news that affect us all
show.title: Leid Stories

title: Leid Stories
content:
“Teachable Moments” About Obama’s Domestic and Foreign Crises It’s been rough for President Obama lately, both home... <!--more--> and abroad.
Even the casual political observer could reasonably conclude that he’s in trouble.
Big trouble.
Leid Stories asks listeners to identify and rate in order of severity the major setbacks, domestic and foreign, that beset the president, and to predict whether, and under what conditions, he can overcome them in his second term.
